dcterms:description: A dataset containing tripartite interaction data from live stream E-Commerce, focusing on user-item buying, user-streamer following, and streamer-item selling interactions.
dcterms:title: LSEC-Small

dcterms:description: A larger dataset containing tripartite interaction data from live stream E-Commerce, focusing on user-item buying, user-streamer following, and streamer-item selling interactions.
dcterms:title: LSEC-Large
